bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: packing all objects into the bin

rules.1: you should never pick and place a box
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: when place a fragile objects, the soft objects must be in the bin
rules.4: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
